longInfo:
Passport required.
- Passports and other documents accepted for entry issued to
  nationals of Lithuania must be valid for the period of
  intended stay. 
Passport Exemptions:
- Holders of a National ID Card issued to nationals of
  Lithuania. 

VISA NOT REQUIRED.

Minors:
- WARNING! In accordance with European Union (EU) Legislation,
  all minors who are nationals of Lithuania will be expected
  to hold their own passport or National ID Card (where
  applicable) when departing from Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus,
  Romania or a Schengen Member State . 
- All minors who are nationals of Lithuania are expected to
  hold their own travel document.
Additional Information:
- Nationals of Lithuania staying in Switzerland for more than
  3 months must apply for a residence permit.
- Geneva airport (GVA) is located by convention in
  Switzerland
